definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
(mining) workability (of deposits of coal, ore etc)

sentences.english: A bee may visit 5000 blossoms a day in fine weather.
sentences.chinese: 天氣好時，一個密蜂可採5000朵花。

sentences.english: The oil-water contact(OWC) is the deepest level of producible oil.
sentences.chinese: 油水界面是可採原油的最深部位。
